overview: Dick Covington is a society athlete who is quick with his fists. His fianc√©e, Jean Manley, hates his fighting and convinces him to stop. But then his rival tricks him into accepting an offer to fight Murdering Mooney at a charity show. At first Jean is chagrined, but when the rival insults her, she is anxious for Covington to beat his opponent.
tagline: A Two Fisted Drama of Love and Thrills
title: Fighting Youth
